mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY ( seq, reply, replyer, parent_id, depth, reply_password ) VALUES ( #{seq}, #{reply}, #{reply_writer}, #{parent_id}, #{depth}, #{reply_password} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM REPLY WHERE RNO = #{reply_rno} AND REPLY_PASSWORD = #{reply_password}
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY SET PARENT_ID = #{parent_id}, depth = #{depth}, REPLY = #{reply_content}, REPLYER = #{reply_writer}, REPLY_PASSWORD = #{reply_password} WHERE RNO = #{reply_rno}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REPLY WHERE BNO = #{bno} ORDER BY RNO ASC
